summary: SummaryConair's Double Ceramic 1875W Dryer, Powerful and fast drying with less damage for healthy-looking hair.
details: DetailsFeatures1875 Watts for fast dryingCool shot button to lock style in placeRocker switchesRemovable filter prevents lint buildup, extending motor lifeBenefitsDouble Ceramic Technology: Infrared heat provides uniform heat for fast drying and less damageConditioning ions: Natural ion output helps to fight frizz & brings out your hair's natural shineIncludesConcentrator included for focused airflow to make hair smooth and sleekDiffuser: Gentle airflow for frizz-free volume and curls.Item 2578510

reviews.headline: Conair Double Ceramic Hair Dryer
reviews.comments: I'm very pleased with my new hair dryer. It's easy to control and dries my hair very quickly.

reviews.headline: Great purchase
reviews.comments: This dryer is lightweight and has good air flow. It's perfect for my fine hair. It doesn't feel like my hair is blowing off my head!

reviews.headline: Just bought this
reviews.comments: Looks really nice.. tried it in the store.. seems powerful for the price.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love this hair dryer! The low power is actually low which I need for my damaged bangs. And this dryer has 3 heat settings which is awesome! I also love the color!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Light weight, smooth air flow, nice temp settings!

reviews.headline: I would  buy  this  product  again.
reviews.comments: Very  happy  with  my  new  hairdryer

reviews.headline: Would not be a recommendation from me
reviews.comments: This hair dryer is not strong, it felt like ot was barely holding on and after 3 uses i noticed a decrease in its ability for have a steady flow.

reviews.headline: died within 3 mins of using - bought today
reviews.comments: i bought this product today, i was really looking forward to diffusing my hair tonight. i followed the directions thoroughly, then it died within 3 minutes of using. it's just annoying. it is a beautiful product, just wish it didn't die within 3 mins of using.
Purchased this 5 months ago and it randomly died on me‚Ä¶. now ill have to invest into a new one :/

reviews.headline: Hair dryer emergency
reviews.comments: I just needed a quick replacement hair dryer. This as a great pick. Good price. It works great, and I like the rose gold/pink color. Three basic settings.

reviews.headline: Don't purchase! Broke soon after buying
reviews.comments: I bought this hair dryer for my daughter because Conair used to be a lretty solid brand, I had some Conair items when I was younger and had no complaints so I figured it was a good starting dryer for her after 5-6 weeks of use it just stopped working, and of course it was after the return window closed. She wasn't even using it that much, she washes her hair every 2-3 days and she has fine, straight hair that dries quickly so it was barely used in this time frame. I am now purchasing her a Babyliss in hopes it will last longer. Save your money and choose a different brand.

reviews.headline: ü•∞üëçüèª
reviews.comments: 2nd purchase in the family‚Ä¶ALL GOOD!

reviews.headline: Regret buying
reviews.comments: I didnt have an issue withis this hair dryer until it randomly died on me and i hadnt had it for over a year. I initially bought it for the cheap price but wish i splurged a little more for something that would have lasted me longer

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Lightweight, quiet, and love the options of heat and air flow. The cooling option is quick. Great price too!

reviews.headline: life
reviews.comments: This dryer has a very short life. When it works, it's great and then the full power dies and starts shooting sparks.

reviews.headline: Cord is too short
reviews.comments: I was looking for a light weight dryer, and this one is the lightest I found, but the cord is only 5 ft long, and it's way too short  to do a blowout on long hair.  I had to return it.

reviews.headline: This hair dryer is very light weight.
reviews.comments: This hair dryer has replaced my older one that was much heavier.

reviews.headline: Weak sauce
reviews.comments: This dryer has NO power behind it. The high setting is more like super low. Takes forever to dry my super short hair.

reviews.headline: I've had this for over a year
reviews.comments: I purchased this in 2021 and it hasn't broken down on me. It's a pretty hair dryer and it works. I have very thick hair that takes 8+ hours to dry, but with the dryer combined with a ventilated brush it's down to 20 minutes. It's my very first hair dryer but it does the job. Only con is that it's really loud, but it was the same way in the store on the sample and when it was new.

reviews.headline: Weak for 1875 watts
reviews.comments: I have a dryer that is 1275 it is stronger than this.for 1875 it is weak not to mention its heavy,returned

faceoff_positive.comments:
I didn't understand why everyone's  raving about ceramic/infrared technology, until I had the opportunity to test the Conair Double Ceramic Dryer¬ÆÔ∏è! I have to admit, I'm utterly delighted simply because smooth, shiny hair is always in style and the Conair Double Ceramic Dryer¬ÆÔ∏è gives you just that! 

Conair's Double Ceramic Dryer¬ÆÔ∏è boasts 2X ceramic technology for seriously smooth results. This thing really cuts down on drying time, which is a lifesaver in the morning. It leaves my hair so smooth and shiny, not all dried out and frizzy. I can practically feel the static disappear when I use it. Styling is so much easier now that my hair is healthier.  Seriously, it's like a mini spa treatment for your hair every time you dry it.

With 3 heat and 2 speed settings, you'll have total control over your style. This thing will give you the best hair of your life. Seriously, the volume and shine are unreal. The diffuser creates gorgeous, bouncy curls, no problem. And if sleek and straight is more your vibe, the concentrator delivers. It's so easy to use, you'll ditch your old one immediately. 

Conair's¬ÆÔ∏è Infrared technology is a total game-changer for my hair care routine! It's surprisingly gentle on my strands unlike other dryers I've tried in the past. This hair dryer is amazing! It really does dry my hair super fast. My hair feels so much healthier and less frizzy. I've noticed way more shine too, which is a huge plus. Definitely recommend checking this one out.
faceoff_positive.headline: YOUR HAIR WILL THANK YOU

faceoff_negative.comments: I was excited when I found out I would be receiving the Conair Double Ceramic Hair Dryer for free, in exchange for an honest review. I loved this right out of the box. It was very pretty, came with an attachment for curly hair and one for targeted drying. Pink, shiny, sleek and stylish. I didn't find it to be overly loud. Let me just say, it works. It doesn't work all that will though. I noticed right away that it just doesn't have the power I wanted it to have. It typically takes me about 15 minutes to thoroughly blow dry my medium volume, shoulder length hair. I typically use a baby bliss blow dryer. It takes me about 30 min to totally dry my hair using this. Despite the longer drying time, I haven't noticed any damage that this caused, so that's good. I guess you have to ask yourself if you mind sacrificing the time?  For me that's a no.
faceoff_negative.headline: Beautiful looking but not great...
